1110011011110101 1010100011100001 1 -> sum: 1000111111010111, cout: 1

1110000101100001 0011000110101111 1 -> sum: 0001001100010001, cout: 1
1010111001100000 1100100010011000 0 -> sum: 0111011011111000, cout: 1
1011001100111011 1110011101101010 1 -> sum: 1001101010100110, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
